mapper.select: SELECT u.UserId, u.UserPwd, u.UserName, g.RoleName, o.OrgId, o.OrgName, Isnull(B.AlarmType, -1) AS AlarmType, ExpiryDay=( CASE WHEN u.ExpiryDate IS NULL OR u.ExpiryDate = '' THEN 8 ELSE ( CASE WHEN Datediff(MINUTE, Getdate(), u.ExpiryDate) >= 0 THEN Datediff(day, Getdate(), u.ExpiryDate) ELSE -1 END ) END ), IsStay=0 FROM sys_User u INNER JOIN sys_Role g ON u.RoleId = g.RoleId LEFT JOIN bas_Org o ON u.OrgId = o.OrgId LEFT JOIN biz_MobUserConfig B ON u.UserId = B.UserId WHERE u.UserId = #{userId}

SELECT v.PlateNum AS UserId, v.[PassWord] AS UserPwd, v.OwnerName AS UserName, v.CorpName AS RoleName, o.OrgId, o.OrgName, -1 AS AlarmType, IsDenyWebGps=( CASE WHEN v.IsDenyWebGps = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ), IsStay=( CASE WHEN v.IsAutoStay = 1 AND v.SVREndTime > CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), Getdate(), 120) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) FROM bas_Vehicle v INNER JOIN bas_Org o ON v.OrgId = o.OrgId LEFT JOIN std_PlateColor c ON v.ColorCode = c.ColorCode WHERE v.PlateNum = #{userId} OR v.PlateNum + ( CASE WHEN c.ColorCode != 9 THEN LEFT(c.ColorName, 1) ELSE c.ColorName END ) = #{userId}

SELECT isExist=( Isnull((SELECT MaxAuth FROM sys_Menu WHERE MenuCode = 'GetTrackAuth'), '0') ), hasModule=( Isnull((SELECT ModuleCode FROM sys_UserAuth_Module WHERE UserId = #{userId} AND ModuleCode = 'TopMobile'), '0') )
SELECT * FROM sys_VehicleIcon WHERE IconType IN ( 'car', 'default' ) ORDER BY IconOrder

;WITH CTEOrg AS (SELECT b.OrgId, b.SearchCode, b.OrgName, b.ParentId, levels=Len(b.SearchCode), t.OrgTypeName, b.Remark, b.Contact, b.Telephone FROM View_UserOrg a INNER JOIN bas_Org b WITH(NOLOCK) ON a.OrgId = b.OrgId LEFT JOIN bas_OrgType t ON b.OrgType = t.OrgType WHERE a.UserId = #{userId} ) SELECT OrgId, SearchCode, aa.OrgName, OrgType, ParentId FROM (SELECT a.OrgId, a.SearchCode, a.OrgName, t.OrgTypeName AS OrgType, ParentId=0 FROM bas_Org a INNER JOIN bas_OrgType t ON a.OrgType = t.OrgType WHERE ParentId = 0 UNION SELECT OrgId, SearchCode, a.OrgName, OrgTypeName AS OrgType, ParentId FROM CTEOrg a)aa ORDER BY ParentId ASC, aa.OrgName COLLATE Chinese_PRC_CS_AS_KS_WS SELECT uv.VehicleId, uv.SimNum, uv.PlateNum, uv.OrgId, t.VehicleTypeName, Isnull(tp.TerminalTypeName, '未知') AS TerminalTypeName, Isnull(v.DVRTypeCode, 0) AS DVRTypeCode, Isnull(v.DVRChannelNum, 0) AS DVRChannelNum, bvc.VehicleOfflineTimeOut, IsOnline=( CASE WHEN cp.recetime IS NOT NULL AND cp.recetime > Dateadd(second, -( CASE WHEN bvc.VehicleOfflineTimeOut IS NULL THEN 5 * 60 WHEN bvc.VehicleOfflineTimeOut > 0 THEN bvc.VehicleOfflineTimeOut ELSE 5 * 60 END ), Getdate()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ), '' AS DVRDeviceId, o.SearchCode FROM View_UserVehicle uv INNER JOIN bas_Vehicle v WITH(NOLOCK) ON uv.VehicleId = v.VehicleId INNER JOIN bas_Org o WITH(NOLOCK) ON uv.OrgId = o.OrgId LEFT JOIN bas_TerminalType tp WITH(NOLOCK) ON v.TerminalTypeId = tp.TerminalTypeId LEFT JOIN std_VehicleType t WITH(NOLOCK) ON v.VehicleTypeCode = t.VehicleTypeCode LEFT JOIN [bas_VehicleConfig] bvc WITH(NOLOCK) ON v.VehicleId = bvc.VehicleId LEFT JOIN biz_CurrentPos cp WITH(NOLOCK) ON uv.SimNum = cp.SimNum WHERE uv.UserId = #{userId} ORDER BY o.SearchCode, PlateNum

SELECT v.OrgId, o.SearchCode, o.OrgName, ot.OrgTypeName AS OrgType, 0 AS ParentId FROM bas_Vehicle v INNER JOIN bas_Org o ON v.OrgId = o.OrgId INNER JOIN bas_OrgType ot ON o.OrgType = ot.OrgType INNER JOIN std_PlateColor c ON v.ColorCode = c.ColorCode WHERE v.PlateNum = #{userId} OR PlateNum + Replace(c.ColorName, '色', '') = #{userId};
SELECT v.VehicleId, v.SimNum, v.PlateNum, v.OrgId, bvc.VehicleOfflineTimeOut, o.SearchCode, t.VehicleTypeName, v.DVRTypeCode, Isnull(v.DVRTypeCode, 0) AS DVRTypeCode, Isnull(v.DVRChannelNum, 0) AS DVRChannelNum, IsOnline=( CASE WHEN cp.recetime IS NOT NULL AND cp.recetime > Dateadd(second, -( CASE WHEN bvc.VehicleOfflineTimeOut IS NULL THEN 5 * 60 WHEN bvc.VehicleOfflineTimeOut > 0 THEN bvc.VehicleOfflineTimeOut ELSE 5 * 60 END ), Getdate()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ), '' AS DVRDeviceId, Isnull(tp.TerminalTypeName, '未知') AS TerminalTypeName FROM bas_Vehicle v INNER JOIN bas_Org o ON v.OrgId = o.OrgId LEFT JOIN bas_TerminalType tp ON v.TerminalTypeId = tp.TerminalTypeId LEFT JOIN std_VehicleType t ON v.VehicleTypeCode = t.VehicleTypeCode LEFT JOIN [bas_VehicleConfig] bvc ON v.VehicleId = bvc.VehicleId INNER JOIN std_PlateColor c ON v.ColorCode = c.ColorCode LEFT JOIN biz_CurrentPos cp WITH(NOLOCK) ON v.SimNum = cp.SimNum WHERE v.PlateNum = #{userId} OR PlateNum + Replace(c.ColorName, '色', '') = #{userId}
